title: Focus
description: Freshman year of college is hard even when you're not tied to the future king of a supernatural society.Allie dives into college head first with Hailey as her roommate and the city of New Orleans as her backyard. As things within The Society heat up, Allie realizes that whether sheâ€™s with Levi or not, she's in far too deep to turn back.
author: Alyssa Rose Ivy
